title: S3 Ep35: S3, The State v. Dennis Perry - Addendum 20 – Cold Case, Heated Politics
itunes:title: S3, The State v. Dennis Perry - Addendum 20 – Cold Case, Heated Politics
description:
December 13, 2018 / Rabia hosts this addendum with Susan to discuss Episode 20 of Season 3, with special guests Jannie Everette, CEO and Founder of the Thiokol Memorial Project, and Marcia Chatelain, Associate Professor of History and African American Studies at Georgetown University. [Image: Display at the Thiokol Museum in Kingsland, Georgia.]

Episode scoring music by Animal Weapon and Blue Dot Sessions.

Today’s Addendum is sponsored by Everlane, Squarespace, and Simplisafe .
